name: Please Keep the Beach Clean
description:
Watercolour, line and ink drawing of a lifeguard station in the Coral Bay area of Paphos, Cyprus. Each year the municipality (controversially) burns the dry foliage between the beach and parking areas to clear the rubbish and overgrown wildlife so the sign always has a slightly sinister aspect if you happen to visit this beach when the blackened area is still smouldering.
Drawn around 2014 this is a high res scan of a freehand sketch. Prints around A2 size.
